passage.title: Making toys from wood
passage.paragraph: Mr. Li has a shop at the side of his house. He makes toys from wood. He makes cars, boats, and trucks. He is making rocking horses now.

Larry comes every week to watch Mr. Li. He wishes he could make toys from wood too. But he never says anyting. One day Mr. Li asks, "Would you like to try this? I can show you now." Larry is very happy.
